name: support_construction
label::english: Support for construction or maintenance of water and/or sanitation facilities

name: support_solidwaste
label::english: Support for solid waste collection and disposal

name: dist_chlorine
label::english: Distribution of chlorine or other disinfecting agents

name: piped_tap
label::english: Piped water connected to public tap

name: surface
label::english: Surface water (river, damn, lake, pond, stream, canal)

name: not_applicable
label::english: Not applicable (item was accessible and affordable)

name: price
label::english: Price of consultation/treatment/medicine is too expensive (affordibility issue)

name: quality
label::english: The quality fo the services is low (bad sercice/unqualified or unfriendly staff)

name: overcrowded
label::english: The facility is overcrowded (there is not enough staff)

name: lack_medicines
label::english: There is a lack of medicines

name: security
label::english: People cannot access a closer health facility due to security

name: damage
label::english: Closer health facility is damaged/destroyed due to the conflict

name: pit_latrine
label::english: Pit latrine with a slab and platform

name: pit_no_slab
label::english: Pit latrine without a slab or platform

name: none_open
label::english: None of the above, open defecation

name: waterpouint_noreach
label::english: Waterpoints are difficult to reach (especially for people with disabilities)

name: dangerous
label::english: Fetching water is a dangerous activity

name: groups_noaccess
label::english: Some groups (children, women, elderly, ethnic minorities, IDPs, etc.) do not have access to the water points

name: waiting_time
label::english: Insufficient number of water points/ waiting time at water points

name: waterpoints_closed
label::english: Water points are not functioning or closed

name: not_available
label::english: Water is not available at the market

name: water_bedtaste
label::english: People don't like the taste/quality of the water

name: far_away
label::english: The market is too far away

name: dangerous
label::english: Going to the market is dangerous

name: groups_noaccess
label::english: Some groups (children, women, elderly, ethnic minorities, IDPs, etc.) do not have access to the market

name: soap_expensive
label::english: Soap is too expensive for some people

name: not_available
label::english: Soap is not available at the market

name: bad_qualoty
label::english: Some people do not like the quality of the soap

name: no_latrines
label::english: Lack of sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) / facilities too crowded

name: latrines_notfunctioning
label::english: Sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) are not functioning or full (overflowing septic tanks)

name: latrines_nosewage
label::english: Sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) lack a system/trucks for removing sewage tank

name: sewage_street
label::english: There is sewage in the streets

name: latines_noprivacy
label::english: Sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) are not private (no locks/door/walls/lighting etc.)

name: latrines_nosegreg
label::english: Sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) are not segregated between men and women

name: latrines_noreach
label::english: Sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) are difficult to reach (especially for people with disabilities)

name: dangerous
label::english: Going to the sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) is dangerous

name: groups_noaccess
label::english: Some groups (children, women, elderly, ethnic minorities, etc.) do not have access to sanitation  facilities (latrines/toilets)

name: less_preferred_drink
label::english: Rely on less preferred (unimproved/untreated) water sources for drinking water

name: surface_water_drink
label::english: Rely on surface water for drinking water

name: less_preferred_cooking
label::english: Rely on less preferred (unimproved/untreated) water sources for other purposes such as cooking and washing

name: surface_water_cooking
label::english: Rely on surface water for other purposes such as cooking and washing

name: fetch_farway
label::english: Fetch water at a source further than the usual one

name: fetch_indangerous
label::english: Fetch water at a source that could be dangerous

name: used_money_tobuy
label::english: Spend money (or credit) on water that should otherwise be used for other purposes

name: reduce_cooking
label::english: Reduce water consumption for other purposes (bathe less, etc.)

name: no_need
label::english: There is no need as they feel water they collect is clean and does not need to be treated

name: no_purification
label::english: They don't have materials for water purification/treatment

name: treat_toolong
label::english: Treating water takes too much time

name: treat_tooexpensive
label::english: Treating water costs too much money

name: no_knowledge
label::english: They don't know any treatment methods
